ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisReappointment of MICHEL JOSEPH BERNARD LOUIS-PHILIPPE COLIN of Montréal, Quebec, as a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Montréal Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, effective July 2, 2022.
